casebody.data:
Abbott et al., Appellants, v. Stepanik, Supt., et al., Appellees.

[Cite as Abbott v. Stepanik (1989), 43 Ohio St. 3d 128.]

(No. 88-1011 Submitted April 27, 1989 Decided May 31, 1989.) Chattman, Garfield, Friedlander & Paul, Gerald B. Chattman, Richard G. Ross and Marc I. Strauss, for appellants. John T. Corrigan, prosecuting attorney, and Michael P. Butler, for appellees.

On the authority of Atkinson v. Grumman Ohio Corp. (1988), 37 Ohio St. 3d 80, 523 N.E. 2d 851, the judgment of the court of appeals is reversed and the cause is remanded to that court for consideration of appellants’ appeal on the merits.

Moyer, C.J., Sweeney, Holmes, Douglas, Wright, H. Brown and Resnick, JJ., concur.
